text: Polestar is a Swedish automotive brand. It was established in 1996 by Volvo Cars' partner Flash/Polestar Racing. It was acquired in 2015 by Volvo. The company is headquartered in Torslanda near Gothenburg, Sweden. The vehicles are made in China. The Polestar name comes from the Polestar racing team. The racing team changed its name to Cyan Racing but still has close ties to Volvo. ==References== Category:1990s establishments in Sweden Category:1996 establishments in Europe Category:Automobile brands Category:Automobile companies of Sweden Category:Gothenburg
title: Polestar
